category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_WORKFLOW_STATUS_MAP
preference.preference_description: Defines the workflow status rules mapping between the Workflow Task and Schedule Task statuses. Valid Values: workflow-task-status.schedule-task-status Valid values for workflow-task-status: In Process Completed Late Aborted Valid values for schedule-task-status: in_progress complete late aborted
